channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Flo travel to Burton Latimer in Leicestershire to turn Rob and Gareth's new-build, empty plot into a Mediterranean, sociable space with room for their hot tub.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is February and archaeologists Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn and historian Ruth Goodman approach the halfway point in their year on the Edwardian Farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey visits Richmond Park's hunting lodge, goes racing at Ascot and is shown around some of the Queen's favourite West End haunts.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Explaining the difference between 'use by', 'best before' and 'display until,' the safety of supermarket pork and the challenges facing Scottish salmon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia travels to Mykonos, one of the chicest resorts in Greece. There she cooks red mullet parcels, and baklava - a traditional sweet Greek dessert made with nuts and honey. (S1/E2).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is February and archaeologists Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn and historian Ruth Goodman approach the halfway point in their year on the Edwardian Farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey meets the members of the Sandringham Women's Institute who knew the Queen personally and learns how to become a horse whisperer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Flo travel to Burton Latimer in Leicestershire to turn Rob and Gareth's new-build, empty plot into a Mediterranean, sociable space with room for their hot tub.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Explaining the difference between 'use by', 'best before' and 'display until,' the safety of supermarket pork and the challenges facing Scottish salmon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: On The Game
channel.desc: A naughty and amusing look at the history of prostitution from cave women to Christine Keeler. Very much of its time as a seventies comedy. Contains sex scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cool It Carol!
channel.desc: A young couple journey to Swinging London in search of fame and fortune. But with work scarce, they get drawn into the seedy world of modelling and sex work. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: A look behind the scenes at a dairy farm to see how they manage demand for milk. The sugar content of yoghurt. Sian looks into dairy alternatives.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Warrington to transform Bindu and Vivek's first garden into a productive, eco-friendly retreat.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is March, and Ruth Goodman, Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn greet the long-awaited arrival of spring. It is time to bring in the daffodil harvest.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey meets the members of the Sandringham Women's Institute who knew the Queen personally and learns how to become a horse whisperer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Stefan reports on the safety of American chlorinated chicken. Sian learns about the side effects of detox teas. Food made from insects too.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia Buxton visits the island of Crete where she creates Cretan pork, cooked with aubergines, bay leaves and cumin seeds. After that, halvas is the pudding of the day with its semolina-base.(S1/E3).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is March, and Ruth Goodman, Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn greet the long-awaited arrival of spring. It is time to bring in the daffodil harvest.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey's adventure concludes in Wales where she visits St David's Cathedral and a royal gold mine in Snowdonia. Last in series.

channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Warrington to transform Bindu and Vivek's first garden into a productive, eco-friendly retreat.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: How To Have A Better Orgasm
channel.desc: Made by women for women, this film reveals proven orgasm-encouraging techniques to try at home. Featuring frank interviews with seven women about their sex lives.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Doomwatch
channel.desc: Scientists investigate a remote island plagued by mutations caused by toxic waste, uncovering a disturbing government cover-up.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Lee are in Southampton to transform an awkwardly shaped plot into a Cypriot-styled paradise for Angus.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia is on her ancestral homeland of Cyprus. There she visits a goat farm to help milk some lively goats and to see how traditional halloumi cheese is made.(S1/E1).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia travels to Mykonos, one of the chicest resorts in Greece. There she cooks red mullet parcels, and baklava - a traditional sweet Greek dessert made with nuts and honey. (S1/E2).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia Buxton visits the island of Crete where she creates Cretan pork, cooked with aubergines, bay leaves and cumin seeds. After that, halvas is the pudding of the day with its semolina-base.(S1/E3).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Rhodes is one of the twelve Dodecanese islands; popular among island-hoppers as they're so close together. Tonia Buxton cooks up a delicious feast of afelia braised pork with coriander seeds.(S1/E4).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Stefan reports on the safety of American chlorinated chicken. Sian learns about the side effects of detox teas. Food made from insects too.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Our intrepid presenters lift the lid on the secrets of our festive food - sprouts, turkeys and why we fall asleep after our massive Christmas Day meals.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down Britain's longest river, the Severn - once a river of division and conflict, now one of connection.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down the beautiful River Test. He discovers why this rare chalk stream is so important and how it's threatened by pollution.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Water Babies
channel.desc: A young chimney sweep falsely accused of theft escapes into a river, entering a magical animated underwater world where he helps free captive Water Babies. A British classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.
